definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The 7th China-EU Leaders' Meeting will take place on the following day there.
sentences.chinese: 第七次中欧领导人会晤将于8日在这里举行。

sentences.english: She was one of the chief leaders of the World Anti-fascist Committee.
sentences.chinese: 她是世界反法西斯委员会的主要领导人之一。

sentences.english: Those opinions and propositions were agreed upon and echoed by many participating leaders.
sentences.chinese: 这些观点和主张得到许多与会领导人的赞同和呼应。

sentences.english: The lawyer has been appointed to mediate between the employers and the union leaders.
sentences.chinese: 这位律师被指定在雇主和工会领导人之间进行调解。

sentences.english: What type of new leaders do we need?
sentences.chinese: 我们需要哪一类型的新领导人？

sentences.english: Southern leaders were pleased with the anti-war movement in the North.
sentences.chinese: 南方领导人很高兴地看到北方的反战运动。

sentences.english: You know, I guess what we need is an independent leader.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们所需要的是一位独立党的领导人。

sentences.english: And Republican leaders say that they agree we must avoid default.
sentences.chinese: 共和党领导人说，他们同意我们必须避免债务欠付。

sentences.english: Chinese leaders that Russia will fulfil the Sino-Russian border agreement faithfully.
sentences.chinese: 中国领导人说，俄罗斯将履行中俄边界协议的回信。

sentences.english: The group was led by black ministers and the local leader of the Black Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 这个组织的领导人是黑人牧师和当地黑人穆斯林首领。

sentences.english: It is not hard to see the reasons for celebrating the end of the line for has-been leaders.
sentences.chinese: 对昔日领导人的末日进行庆祝的原因并不难理解。

sentences.english: Party leaders have ensured that the ACFTU has a monopolist position.
sentences.chinese: 档的领导人保证全总工拥有垄断地位。

sentences.english: The Chinese presidents have attended all the APEC informal leaders’ meetings.
sentences.chinese: 中国国家主席出席了历次APEC领导人非正式会议。

sentences.english: Our leaders joined the people in the festivities in the parks.
sentences.chinese: 我们的领导人参加了群众的游园庆祝活动。
中国的领导人中没有阿斗。

sentences.english: Mr. Andropov is a strong, self-confident leader, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，安德罗波夫先生是一个坚强自信的领导人。

definition: within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
